name: vscode-zip-viewer
description: A browser and viewer for zip files in the workspace

zipView.maxFileSize.description: Maximum file size (in MB) that can be previewed from zip archives. ⚠️ Warning: Setting this above the default (10MB) may cause high memory usage or crashes when opening large files.

zipView.maxCompressionRatio.description: Maximum allowed compression ratio (uncompressed/compressed size) for zip entries. Files exceeding this ratio are blocked as potential zip bombs. ⚠️ Warning: Setting this above the default (100) increases vulnerability to zip bomb attacks which can cause memory exhaustion and crashes.

zipView.maxCacheSize.description: Maximum number of file contents to cache in memory for faster access. ⚠️ Warning: Setting this above the default (50) increases memory usage, especially when viewing large files.

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
